name: Weapon Roulette
description:
Take control of Lucky Knight in his journey inside the deepest dungeon where you don't choose your weapon, but your weapon chooses you! Fight hordes of incoming demons and try to survive the longest before facing your doom. 

 Follow me on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kalachgames/ 

Music by Jean-marc Saad -  SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/vch-psy/
